answers.answer: I had puv in first weeks because I conceived on the pill ... I'm now 22+6 with a healthy boy :)Hopefully it works out for you too.. rest up and stay positive ♡
what is puv??? sorry if thats a silly question. but thanks so much. im trying to stay positive.

had another sonogram done at the ob/gyn and they said everything looked normal. apparently in the ER they thght the size of the gestational sac was too big but when they measured it at the ob/gyn they said everything looked fine. big relief for me and my hubby.

Glad to hear the good news.  Drs will tell you that lots of things are wrong but dont listen to them until after they run all the tests. My Dr told me I had diabetes congestive heart failure and high bp. Put me on meds even.  Afterwards they ran all the tests and I'm so healthy. Bp normal blood sugar normal and definitely no heart failure.  I'm obese but very healthy despite being fat.  Always for the tests to be sure that what they say is correct.

question: hello,I am 6weeks and 4days. I went to the ER yesterday after i noticed some bleeding. Dr said they found an abnormality in the gestational sac but it was too small to determine what it was and that i should follow up with ob/gyn. My first appt is already scheduled for tomorrow morning but i am super nervous. This is my first baby and no mother to be wants to hear bad news. Does anyone have any similar stories they can share with positive outcomes???
title: u/s found abnormality in gestational sac
